document.full_text: almost overlooked as charl schwartzel surged clear of a congested leaderboard to clinch this month's u.s. masters with a sizzling finish was the fact that he eclipsed tiger woods with his breakthrough.
document.title: schwartzel's masters breakthrough trumps woods
lines_and_colors: almost overlooked as charl schwartzel surged clear of a congested leaderboard to clinch this month's u.s. masters with a sizzling finish was the fact that he eclipsed tiger woods with his breakthrough.
